}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The MAC of the card populating this entry is 00:50:8B:6A:F2:BD.
'''[[Compaq]]''' Spares # 323556-001 / 323553-001, Addl. P/N 323557-001, Rev. C, '''[[Intel]]''' P/N 702536-009 (?) :The bottom of the card has the PB # (701015-001) and MP # (701016-001).
